claims.claim: Intratumoral mRNA vaccination triggers local innate sensing and type I interferon signaling in tumors.

evidence.quote: Type I interferon response score (normalized units) 3.1 vs 1.0 Marked induction after mRNA vaccination in tumors
Intratumoral mRNA vaccination triggers local innate sensing and type I interferon signaling.

claims.caveat: Some mechanistic readouts were strongest in specific model systems rather than uniformly across all tested settings.

claims.claim: mRNA vaccination broadens the peptide repertoire presented on MHC-I, improving tumor visibility to T cells.

evidence.quote: Fraction of tumor proteins represented in immunopeptidome 62.3% vs 37.3% Broader antigen display after intratumoral mRNA vaccination
A broader peptide repertoire appears on MHC-I, improving tumor visibility to T cells.

claims.caveat: Mouse model effects may not map one-to-one to all human tumors.

claims.claim: Combined intratumoral mRNA vaccination and anti-PD-L1 therapy improves tumor control in mice.

evidence.quote: Intratumoral CD8+ T-cell density fold-change 1.8x vs 1.0x Increased immune infiltration with combination therapy
Combined intervention improves tumor control in mice and aligns with better outcomes in the retrospective human cohort.

claims.caveat: Mouse model effects may not map one-to-one to all human tumors.

claims.claim: Prior SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccination correlates with better outcomes in patients receiving immune checkpoint inhibitors.

evidence.quote: Retrospective human survival comparison p-value p=0.01 N/A Vaccinated subgroup had improved survival under ICI treatment
Combined intervention improves tumor control in mice and aligns with better outcomes in the retrospective human cohort.

claims.caveat: The human analysis is retrospective and non-randomized; residual confounding is likely.

claims.claim: PD-L1 pathway activity increases after mRNA vaccination, creating a rationale for combining with checkpoint blockade.

evidence.quote: PD-L1 expression fold-change in tumor tissue 2.4x vs 1.0x Checkpoint axis became more targetable
PD-L1 pathway activity also increases, creating a rationale for combining with checkpoint blockade.

claims.caveat: Some mechanistic readouts were strongest in specific model systems rather than uniformly across all tested settings.
